# The `M68kISelLowering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the interfaces that <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> uses to lower LLVM code into a selection DAG. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the interfaces that <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k">M68k</a> uses to lower LLVM code into a selection DAG.

<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Force all the incoming stack arguments to be loaded from the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// before any new outgoing arguments are stored to the stack, because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outgoing stack slots may alias the incoming argument stack slots, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the alias isn&#39;t otherwise explicit. This is slightly more conservative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than necessary, because it means that each store effectively depends</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on every argument instead of just those arguments it would clobber.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RetOps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a3963ce0b1b988776399447f21df86b15">getRegister</a>(VA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a17dbc2feaea84ef8d353095d6e618f29">getLocReg</a>(), VA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#ab7c2e47e51795ce2f60500846109d5a7">getLocVT</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Swift calling convention does not require we copy the sret argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into %d0 for the return, and SRetReturnReg is not set for Swift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ABI require that for returning structs by value we copy the sret argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into %D0 for the return. Save the argument into a virtual register so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we can access it from the return points.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Checking Function.hasStructRetAttr() here is insufficient because the IR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may not have an explicit sret argument. If MFI.CanLowerReturn is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// false, then an sret argument may be implicitly inserted in the SelDAG. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either case MFI-&gt;setSRetReturnReg() will have been called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SRetReg = MFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/m68kmachinefunctioninfo/#a86028cbccf87f3c198d7369ea421d334">getSRetReturnReg</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ??? Can i just move this to the top and escape this explanation?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we have both sret and another return value, we should use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original Chain stored in RetOps&#91;0&#93;, instead of the current Chain updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the above loop. If we only have sret, RetOps&#91;0&#93; equals to Chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the case of sret and another return value, we have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Chain&#95;0 at the function entry</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Chain&#95;1 = getCopyToReg(Chain&#95;0) in the above loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we use Chain&#95;1 in getCopyFromReg, we will have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Val = getCopyFromReg(Chain&#95;1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Chain&#95;2 = getCopyToReg(Chain&#95;1, Val) from below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getCopyToReg(Chain&#95;0) will be glued together with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getCopyToReg(Chain&#95;1, Val) into Unit A, getCopyFromReg(Chain&#95;1) will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in Unit B, and we will have cyclic dependency between Unit A and Unit B:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Data dependency from Unit B to Unit A due to usage of Val in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     getCopyToReg(Chain&#95;1, Val)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Chain dependency from Unit A to Unit B</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So here, we use RetOps&#91;0&#93; (i.e Chain&#95;0) for getCopyFromReg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> Val = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a6551350658729b36c93362fcff19abab">getCopyFromReg</a>(RetOps&#91;0&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SRetReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a8aabf5d0aa80038973255ff2d1e1a9fc">getPointerTy</a>(MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a82dd10b626a629b9bb7d32d53a8e0884">getDataLayout</a>()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ??? How will this work if CC does not use registers for args passing?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ??? What if I return multiple structs?</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a155ffe05aa8e1991b486a7f96ff2e828">getCopyToReg</a>(Chain, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, RetValReg, Val, Glue);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Glue = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>.getValue(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RetOps.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the glue if we have it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Glue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a2b08aa629a6326d1a0444ee6d477c39d">getNode</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kisd/#a5d785b7c28047e4e75d1fed254de7a5ead7fa9da10b119eb169b7ae6e431c3321">M68kISD::RET</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::Other, RetOps);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                Fast Calling Convention (tail call) implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Like std call, callee cleans arguments, convention except that ECX is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  reserved for storing the tail called function address. Only 2 registers are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  free for argument passing (inreg). Tail call optimization is performed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  provided:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                &#42; tailcallopt is enabled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                &#42; caller/callee are fastcc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  On M68k&#95;64 architecture with GOT-style position independent code only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  local (within module) calls are supported at the moment. To keep the stack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  aligned according to platform abi the function GetAlignedArgumentStackSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ensures that argument delta is always multiples of stack alignment. (Dynamic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  linkers need this - darwin&#39;s dyld for example) If a tail called function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  callee has more arguments than the caller the caller needs to make sure that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  there is room to move the RETADDR to. This is achieved by reserving an area</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  the size of the argument delta right after the original RETADDR, but before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  the saved framepointer or the spilled registers e.g. caller(arg1, arg2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  calls callee(arg1, arg2,arg3,arg4) stack layout:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    arg1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    arg2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    RETADDR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#91; new RETADDR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      move area &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (possible EBP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ESI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    EDI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    local1 ..</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Make the stack size align e.g 16n + 12 aligned for a 16-byte align</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// requirement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">M68kTargetLowering::GetAlignedArgumentStackSize(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetFrameLowering &amp;TFI = &#42;Subtarget.getFrameLowering();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackAlignment = TFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a07ed686a79bd6b4e4702981c4f85ec19">getStackAlignment</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t AlignMask = StackAlignment - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = StackSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SlotSize = Subtarget.getSlotSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &amp; AlignMask) &lt;= (StackAlignment - SlotSize)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number smaller than 12 so just add the difference.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> += ((StackAlignment - SlotSize) - (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &amp; AlignMask));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask out lower bits, add stackalignment once plus the 12 bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ((~AlignMask) &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>) + StackAlignment + (StackAlignment - SlotSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check whether the call is eligible for tail call optimization. Targets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that want to do tail call optimization should implement this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M68kTargetLowering::IsEligibleForTailCallOptimization(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Callee, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">CallingConv::ID</a> CalleeCC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsVarArg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsCalleeStructRet, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsCallerStructRet, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;RetTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ISD::OutputArg&gt;</a> &amp;Outs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;SDValue&gt;</a> &amp;OutVals,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ISD::InputArg&gt;</a> &amp;Ins, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#ae812d40144fafed6fd7c00cffb790504">mayTailCallThisCC</a>(CalleeCC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If -tailcallopt is specified, make fastcc functions tail-callable.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CCMatch = CallerCC == CalleeCC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#aa99670b16fe6d370e306896cd91b6fa6">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#ab1fb67187fc37e569cc5171cbebba873">Options</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions/#ad54fc81a4ef7ab96137a9b6e78fdf838">GuaranteedTailCallOpt</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for obvious safe cases to perform tail call optimization that do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require ABI changes. This is what gcc calls sibcall.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can&#39;t do sibcall if stack needs to be dynamically re-aligned. PEI needs to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emit a special epilogue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M68kRegisterInfo &#42;RegInfo = Subtarget.getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegInfo-&gt;hasStackRealignment(MF))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also avoid sibcall optimization if either caller or callee uses struct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return semantics.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not sibcall optimize vararg calls unless all arguments are passed via</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LLVMContext &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = &#42;DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#adecf615928faed0c8a082ffdb65dfea0">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the call results are passed in the same way.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate/#a26c8cba96e72f333e829e607938ce893">CCState::resultsCompatible</a>(CalleeCC, CallerCC, MF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, Ins, RetCC&#95;M68k,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The callee has to preserve all registers the caller needs to preserve.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> M68kRegisterInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = Subtarget.getRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackArgsSize = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the callee takes no arguments then go on to check the results of the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Outs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if stack adjustment is needed. For now, do not do this if any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument is passed on the stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;CCValAssign, 16&gt;</a> ArgLocs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CCState CCInfo(CalleeCC, IsVarArg, MF, ArgLocs, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CCInfo.AnalyzeCallOperands(Outs, CC&#95;M68k);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StackArgsSize = CCInfo.getStackSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PromoteMULO = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExtOp) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t have 8-bit multiplications, so promote i8 version of U/SMULO</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to i16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ideally this should be done by legalizer but sadly there is no promotion</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create a BTST (Bit Test) node - Test bit \\p BitNo in \\p Src and set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// condition according to equal/not-equal condition code \\p CC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653" lineLink="#abe5e992f068a415fe4bdf83147b9091a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#abe5e992f068a415fe4bdf83147b9091a">getBitTestCondition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Src, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> BitNo, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#ac3c3cf58d6d631af6a172457304d3d07">ISD::CondCode</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Src is i8, promote it to i32 with any&#95;extend.  There is no i8 BTST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.  Since the shift amount is in-range-or-undefined, we know</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that doing a bittest on the i32 value is ok.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src.getValueType() == MVT::i8 || Src.getValueType() == MVT::i16)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the operand types disagree, extend the shift amount to match.  Since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BTST ignores high bits (like shifts) we can use anyextend.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src.getValueType() != BitNo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a6b2b8ca5b0fdf6484247d5ae74deb9ff">getValueType</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BitNo = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a27d5d8ef82302b739ba3ca8be1a5513d">ISD::ANY&#95;EXTEND</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Src.getValueType(), BitNo);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3064"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3065"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CCR operand of SelectItr might be missing a kill marker</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3066"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because there were multiple uses of CCR, and ISel didn&#39;t know</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getDebugLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To &quot;insert&quot; a SELECT&#95;CC instruction, we actually have to insert the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// diamond control-flow pattern.  The incoming instruction knows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination vreg to set, the condition code register to branch on, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// true/false values to select between, and a branch opcode to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a4874816314c3308be0bf1e71de2078d8">getBasicBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ThisMBB:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   TrueVal = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   cmp ccX, r1, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bcc Copy1MBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   fallthrough --&gt; Copy0MBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineBasicBlock &#42;ThisMBB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineFunction &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This code lowers all pseudo-CMOV instructions. Generally it lowers these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as described above, by inserting a MBB, and then making a PHI at the join</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point to select the true and false operands of the CMOV in the PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The code also handles two different cases of multiple CMOV opcodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a row.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, there are multiple CMOVs in a row, all which are based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same condition setting (or the exact opposite condition setting).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case we can lower all the CMOVs using a single inserted MBB, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then make a number of PHIs at the join point to model the CMOVs. The only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trickiness here, is that in a case like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2 = CMOV cond1 t1, f1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t3 = CMOV cond1 t2, f2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when rewriting this into PHIs, we have to perform some renaming on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// temps since you cannot have a PHI operand refer to a PHI result earlier</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the same block.  The &quot;simple&quot; but wrong lowering would be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2 = PHI t1(BB1), f1(BB2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t3 = PHI t2(BB1), f2(BB2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but clearly t2 is not defined in BB1, so that is incorrect. The proper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// renaming is to note that on the path through BB1, t2 is really just a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// copy of t1, and do that renaming, properly generating:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t2 = PHI t1(BB1), f1(BB2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// t3 = PHI t1(BB1), f2(BB2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 2, we lower cascaded CMOVs such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (CMOV (CMOV F, T, cc1), T, cc2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to two successives branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &#42;CascadedCMOV = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstr &#42;LastCMOV = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#a3ae7fc35b1e164744d5f085ff1e84039">M68k::CondCode</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#a3ae7fc35b1e164744d5f085ff1e84039">M68k::CondCode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getImm());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#a3ae7fc35b1e164744d5f085ff1e84039">M68k::CondCode</a> OppCC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#a876bb5be568d372d0a658d2ea5927b74">M68k::GetOppositeBranchCondition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> NextMIIt =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::next(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for case 1, where there are multiple CMOVs with the same condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first.  Of the two cases of multiple CMOV lowerings, case 1 reduces the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of jumps the most.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a668dc2e56825f61a14fbb3116315668f">isCMOVPseudo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if we have a string of CMOVS with the same condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NextMIIt != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="#a668dc2e56825f61a14fbb3116315668f">isCMOVPseudo</a>(&#42;NextMIIt) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3168"><span class="doxyHighlight">           (NextMIIt-&gt;getOperand(3).getImm() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a> ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NextMIIt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This checks for case 2, but only do this if we didn&#39;t already find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case 1, as indicated by LastCMOV == MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastCMOV == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> &amp;&amp; NextMIIt != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;unsigned, std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;&gt; RegRewriteTable;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MachineInstrBuilder MIB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As we are creating the PHIs, we have to be careful if there is more than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// one.  Later CMOVs may reference the results of earlier CMOVs, but later</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHIs have to reference the individual true/false inputs from earlier PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// That also means that PHI construction must work forward from earlier to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later, and that the code must maintain a mapping from earlier PHI&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination registers, and the registers that went into the PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MIIt = MIItBegin; MIIt != MIItEnd; ++MIIt) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> DestReg = MIIt-&gt;getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> Op1Reg = MIIt-&gt;getOperand(1).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> Op2Reg = MIIt-&gt;getOperand(2).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3273"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this CMOV we are generating is the opposite condition from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the jump we generated, then we have to swap the operands for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI that is going to be generated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MIIt-&gt;getOperand(3).getImm() == OppCC)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3278"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(Op1Reg, Op2Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegRewriteTable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(Op1Reg) != RegRewriteTable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Op1Reg = RegRewriteTable&#91;Op1Reg&#93;.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RegRewriteTable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(Op2Reg) != RegRewriteTable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3284"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Op2Reg = RegRewriteTable&#91;Op2Reg&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MIB =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;SinkMBB, SinkInsertionPoint, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;get(M68k::PHI), DestReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3288"><span class="doxyHighlight">            .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Op1Reg)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3290"><span class="doxyHighlight">            .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#a927857fc69e4b4f0cde307f86f180df5">addReg</a>(Op2Reg)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3292"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RegRewriteTable&#91;DestReg&#93; = std::make&#95;pair(Op1Reg, Op2Reg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
